title: Youtube-Watchlater-Mcp
description: An MCP server that retrieves URLs of videos added to a specified YouTube playlist within a configurable timeframe using OAuth2 for secure access.
creator: rados10

OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: OAuth2 client ID from Google Cloud credentials.

OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: OAuth2 client secret from Google Cloud credentials.

OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN.description: Refresh token obtained from Google OAuth2 flow.
